com.compendium.core.datamodel
Class View

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.datamodel.PCObject
      com.compendium.core.datamodel.IdObject
          com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodeSummary
              com.compendium.core.datamodel.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIdObject, INodeSummary, IPCObject, IView, ICoreConstants, java.io.Serializable
public class View
extends NodeSummary
implements IView, java.io.Serializable

The View object is a node that represents a collection of nodes and links. The visual representation of the nodes and links depends on the type of the view.

See Also:
Serialized Form

protected View(java.lang.String sViewID,

               java.lang.String sAuthor,
               java.util.Date dCreationDate,
               java.util.Date dModificationDate,
               java.lang.String sLabel,
               java.lang.String sDetail)
Constructor, creates a View object.

Parameters:
String - sViewID, the id of the view node.
nType - int, the type of this node.
sXNodeType - String, the extended node type id of the node - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
sOriginalID - String, the original id of the node if it was imported.
sAuthor - String, the author of this node.
dCreationDate - Date, the creation date of this node.
dModificationDate - Date, the date the node was last modified.

View

protected View(java.lang.String sViewID,
               int nType,
               java.lang.String sXNodeType,
               java.lang.String sOriginalID,
               int nPermission,
               int nState,
               java.lang.String sAuthor,
               java.util.Date dCreationDate,
               java.util.Date dModificationDate,
               java.lang.String sLabel,
               java.lang.String sDetail)
Constructor, creates a View object.

Parameters:
String - sViewID, the id of the view node.
int - nType, the type of this node.
String - sXNodeType, the extended node type id of the node - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
String - sOriginalID, the original id of the node if it was imported.
int - nPermission, the permissions in this node - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
int - nState, the state of this node: not read (0) read (1), modified since last read (2).
String - sAuthor, the author of the node.
Date - dCreationDate, the creation date of this node.
Date - dModificationDate, the date the node was last modified.
String - sLabel, the label of this node.
String - sDetail, the first page of detail for this node.

Constructor, creates a View object.

Parameters:
sViewID - the id of the view node.
nType - the type of this node.
sXNodeType - the extended node type id of the node - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
sOriginalID - the original id of the node if it was imported.
nPermission - the permissions in this node - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
nState - the state of this node: not read (0) read (1), modified since last read (2).
sAuthor - the author of the node.
dCreationDate - the creation date of this node.
dModificationDate - the date the node was last modified.
